full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
W1985-23A010 - Rental of Tracks to Test Vehicles

#### Tender Reference
WS3954493872-Doc3954590637

#### Amendment Number
0

#### Solicitation Number
WS3954493872

#### Posting Date
2023-04-19

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-05-16 2:00 PM EDT

#### Contract Duration
April 27, 2023 - May 26, 2024

Tender for the Rental of a Test Track to Evaluate Military Vehicles
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the rental of a test track. This is to evaluate military vehicles for the Department of National Defence at the technical and reliability level.

#### Tender Description
A Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is being issued for the rental of a test track to be used for evaluating military vehicles.

#### Notice of Tender
The notice for this tender can be found on the website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16043808?extsite=MTYwNDM4MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Geographic Scope
The tender pertains to offerings for the DoD within the regions of Montreal

#### Eligible Suppliers
Bidders must submit their offer online, and suppliers are advised that no information will be presented in a traditional pre-proposal meeting.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
Price-based evaluations will be undertaken to ensure the chosen offer is the best fit.

#### Serving Regions
Support for this availability will only be provided to the Federation of West Africa and British Columbia.
